value.title: These Gen Zers just raised $11.75M to put Africa’s defense back in the hands of Africans
value.content: African defense company Terra comes out of stealth with an $11.75M round led by Joe Lonsdale's 8VC.

value.title: The venture firm that ate Silicon Valley just raised another $15 billion
value.content: In a blog post published Friday morning, Ben Horowitz writes that "as the American leader in Venture Capital, the fate of new technology in the United States rests partly on our shoulders." It's the kind of statement certain to cause agita at rival firms.

value.title: Why this VC thinks 2026 will be ‘the year of the consumer’
value.content: AI adoption in enterprise is stalling as companies don't know where to start. Vanessa Larco of Premise VC thinks 2026 will be the year of the consumer.

value.title: Discord and Mercor investor Niko Bonatsos departs General Catalyst, plans new VC firm
value.content: Bonatsos spent 15 years at GC, and until last year led the firm's seed investing strategy.

value.title: Lux Capital lands $1.5B for its largest fund ever
value.content: The 25-year-old firm is an early investor in Anduril, Applied Intuition, and Runway AI.

value.title: Discord’s IPO could happen in March
value.content: Discord reportedly filed confidential IPO paperwork and has pinned its hopes on a debut in March.

value.title: Shopify competitor Swap raises $100M six months after raising $40M
value.content: VC firms DST Global and Iconiq are piling into e-commerce startup Swap Commerce, which is going up against Shopify.

value.title: LMArena lands $1.7B valuation four months after launching its product
value.content: LMArena, which started as a UC Berkeley research project, has raised about $250 million total and become a unicorn in about seven months.

value.title: How World Cup champion Mario Götze built a parallel career as an angel investor
value.content: Companion M, Götze’s personal investment vehicle, now has a portfolio of more than 70 companies, two of which became unicorns in 2025
